name: Farmer's Delight
description:
Welcome to life on the farm! Get ready for an authentic farm experience. Just watch out, some of your crops can get a little... rowdy.

Plant, water, and harvest a cornucopia of different crops in this action-packed down-to-earth farming sim. Sell crops to buy new tools that will make your farm even more efficient. Make sure not to let your crops get override though, or they'll attack.

------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move. Mouse to aim and shoot. 

Q or Middle Mouse to open the tool inventory

1-4 to select tools

Tools:

     1 = Harvesting     2 = Planting

     3 = Watering        4 = Gun

------------------------------------------------------------

Written in C# using Unity3D
Sprites made with GIMP and Piskel
Models made with Blender
SFX made with Bfxr
------------------------------------------------------------

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 41. The theme was "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres." 

This was my first game jam and, while the menus and sounds are very rushed, I think it turned out pretty well!
